mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_note (title, content, is_shared, is_deleted, nb_id, author, create_time, modified_user, modified_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{isShared}, #{isDeleted}, #{nbId}, #{author}, #{createTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT nid, title, content, is_shared isShared, is_deleted isDeleted, nb_id nbId, author, create_time createTime, modified_user modifiedUser, modified_time modifiedTime FROM t_note WHERE nb_id = #{nbId}
